page.title: 10TRAFFIC 3
page.content:
{BY-PASS SURVEY
We carried out a survey to see what the people in Towcester think about a new by-pass, which is soon to be built. Out of{30}people asked, they all agreed that Towcester needed a by-pass, for the following reasons: { 1.}There are too many traffic jams at rush hours and during the holiday season. {2.}Heavy lorries which are breaking up roads and causing damage to buildings, need to be out of Towcester. { 3.}There is a poor East-West trunk road running through Towcester.
People said that a new road has only become necessary in the last few years and they welcome the proposal.
